section_a.beneficiaries: rE The company's activities will provide benefit to improve the lives of individuals it serves, including but not restricting itself to, the economic, social, personal, academic, health and wellbeing. CLDI works in partnership with local, national and even international organisations to achieve its aim. CLDI is community led meaning it is driven by its internal steering boards that are made up of the local community
